definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
sb with whom one is on familiar terms/sb from the same place (same house, same town etc)/one of us
(neologism 2015) the Zhao family (derogatory term for those who hold power in the PRC)
people who don't belong together, don't get to live together (idiom)/marriages are predestined/people marry because they share common traits
pinyin: bu4 shi4 yi1 jia1 ren2 bu4 jin4 yi1 jia1 men2
containing_words.word: 不是一家人不進一家門

sentences.english: The Browns are all college graduates.
sentences.chinese: 布朗一家人都是大學畢業生。

sentences.english: She visited her ‘former family’ in Katni regularly.
sentences.chinese: 他也定期與她的‘家人’在卡尼特會面。

sentences.english: He and his family will also be getting food from the charity.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的家人也將通過慈善組織獲得食物。

sentences.english: May God bless the grieving families, and may God continue to bless America.
sentences.chinese: 願神保佑他們悲慟的家人，願神繼續保佑美國。

sentences.english: I am tiziano, just like your friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 我是“提香”，就像你的朋友和家人。

sentences.english: To his family, their guilt, to work, but no regrets.
sentences.chinese: 對家人，她們心存內疚，對工作，卻無怨無悔。

sentences.english: You should send a message to your family, maybe they are looking forward to it!
sentences.chinese: 給您的家人報一聲平安，或許他們正在翹首企盼。

sentences.english: LanShi DE family together to Yangs marriage.
sentences.chinese: 藍仕德家人一同去楊家提親。

sentences.english: He would give entire earnings to Campbell's family from succeeding bouts.
sentences.chinese: 而他以後比賽的所有獎金將全部交給坎貝爾的家人。

sentences.english: He is a lovely boy but he has no family.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個可愛的男孩，但是卻失去了家人。

sentences.english: The Huang family went to the countryside for vacation.
sentences.chinese: 黃家一家人去鄉下渡假。

sentences.english: Theres a reason people cant wait for Christmas, and it haslittle to do with family reunions.
sentences.chinese: 人們等不及過聖誕節的理由和家人團聚沒有任何關係。

sentences.english: Make a commitment to turning off the TV and spending some quality time with your loved ones.
sentences.chinese: 約定好關掉電視機，與家人共渡一段高質量的時光。

sentences.english: Chicken soup is often thought to be a healthy dish (prepared by a family member) and (given to us) when we are sick.
sentences.chinese: 雞湯常被認爲是我們生病時，家人爲我們準備的補品。

sentences.english: Buddies can be co-workers, family members, friends.
sentences.chinese: 同伴可以是同事，家人或者朋友。

sentences.english: We read books aloud a lot in our family.
sentences.chinese: 咱們的家人常大聲朗誦書。

definition: a relative (i.e. family relation)/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
